content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to negotiate with you. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, Max. I am aware that you are a student, so I am willing to offer you a special discount. I can offer you the apartment for 750 euros a month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not willing to offer a discount based on your student status.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable, Max. Let's stick to the market price, then. I can offer you the apartment for 800 euros a month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 800 euros a month is a fair offer, but I believe my apartment is worth more. I can offer you the apartment for 850 euros a month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your negotiation skills, Max. However, I cannot go any higher than 840 euros a month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 840 euros a month is not satisfactory to me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Max. Let's try to find a compromise. I can offer you 835 euros a month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 835 euros a month is still not satisfactory to me. I can offer you the apartment for 845 euros a month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to meet you halfway, Max. How about 840 euros a month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [840] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
